text: 19.21: Mt 6.20 naŋga, Lu 12.33 naŋga, Sɨ 2.45 naŋga, 4.34-37 naŋga, 1 Ti 6.18-19Kamavahi Jisas ambami, Avinzɨkwɨ mɨŋga kɨyɨman vataŋgata, uta nandɨ muhɨmɨmuhɨm sɨhanaŋga ŋguna mut mɨŋamu. Kamatu tɨmbahɨrɨs ha mɨŋatuta muhɨmɨmuhɨm manɨman saŋ haŋɨnɨŋ ŋgu. Kamatɨrɨmana handa Gotɨndu pɨhuyɨndu avihɨmɨŋgɨm mɨŋɨmana. Kamata yi naŋga pañɨ, vami.
